mean_en: someone who plays a musical instrument while another person is singing or playing the main part :someone who plays an accompaniment
word_etyma: ac 一再 + compan陪伴 + ist 与某事物有关的人 → n. 伴奏者；伴随者
short_phrase: the singer and her accompanist on piano
sentence: She sang while her accompanists played piano and double bass.
sentence_trans: 她唱歌，她的伴奏者弹吉他和低音提琴。
